Name: BlazBlue Centralfiction
About the game: Re-live Arc System Works' trademark beautiful visuals and deep expressive combat, with improved netplay! Now is the perfect time for veterans and new challengers alike to return to the Azure! Choose from 35 unique anime-inspired characters utilizing various new and refined system mechanics. The Wheel of Fate turns again! A high-speed 2D fighting game combined with a breathtaking visual novel, the bookend to this chapter of the series breathes in new life...
